topic: Cascade Failures & Feedback Loops in AI/Multi-Agent Systems

papers.title: A Lyapunov-Based Small-Gain Theorem for Fixed-Time ISS: Theory, Optimization, and Games
papers.reason: Core paper on interconnected systems stability, feedback analysis, and cascade effects. Directly addresses small-gain conditions to prevent instability propagation in networked systems.

papers.title: Flocking phase transition and threat responses in bio-inspired autonomous swarms
papers.reason: Multi-agent autonomous systems with phase transitions, coordination failures, and emergent behavior. Directly relevant to cascade failures in swarm systems.

papers.title: A Plan Reuse Mechanism for LLM-Driven Agent
papers.reason: LLM agent systems with plan failures and error handling. Addresses robustness in AI agent operations.

papers.title: Agentic Explainable Artificial Intelligence (Agentic-XAI): Approach To Explainability in Agentic Systems
papers.reason: Multi-agent AI systems with focus on agent interactions and system-level behaviors. Addresses understanding complex agent failures.

papers.title: Safe Navigation with Zonotopic Tubes: An Elastic Tube-based MPC Framework
papers.reason: Robustness and safety in control systems with disturbance propagation, feedback control, and error tolerance mechanisms.

papers.title: Quadruped-Legged Robot Movement Plan Generation using Large Language Model
papers.reason: LLM-driven autonomous robot system with distributed architecture and failure handling. Relevant to AI-driven operational systems.

papers.title: Autonomous Uncertainty Quantification for Computational Point-of-care Sensors
papers.reason: Autonomous systems with error detection and uncertainty quantification to prevent diagnostic failures. Shows operational robustness mechanisms.

papers.title: The Dynamical Anatomy of Anderson Acceleration: From Adaptive Momentum to Variable-Mass ODEs
papers.reason: Instability mechanisms, energy injection, and feedback dynamics in optimization systems. Demonstrates how unchecked growth creates system instability.

papers.title: Wireless Center of Pressure Feedback System for Humanoid Robot Balance Control using ESP32-C3
papers.reason: Real-time feedback control system for robot stability with wireless architecture. Shows distributed control and failure prevention.

papers.title: Assessing the Software Security Comprehension of Large Language Models
papers.reason: LLM systems with vulnerability detection and security failure analysis. Relevant to AI system safety and error propagation in code generation.
